background: Grätzlfarben was initially developed under the name 'Kiezcolors' by ODIS and CityLAB Berlin. The Research Unit Cartography at TU Wien adapted it for Vienna. You can find the code to this project on GitHub.
dataSources:
Data sources:

imprint:
Imprint:
This is a research prototype – Data and functionality without warranty! Developed at the Research Unit Cartography at TU Wien, Wiedner Hauptstraße 8-10, 1040 Wien
description: Here you can create a postcard showing the distribution of land use in your neighbourhood. Simply move the map of Vienna or search for a location. You can also change the text on the postcard.

meta.description: A map based tool to create a postcard showing the landuse distribution in your neighborhood
